info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 16 at 4:48PM CDT until May 16 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago IL
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Livingston County in central Illinois... Ford County in east central Illinois... Iroquois County in east central Illinois... Benton County in northwestern Indiana... Newton County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Jasper County in northwestern Indiana...
* Until 645 PM CDT/745 PM EDT/.
* At 448 PM CDT/548 PM EDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near El Paso, IL to near Otterbein, IN, moving northeast.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Emergency Management.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 188 and 218. I-57 between mile markers 258 and 301. Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 220.
Locations impacted include... Buckley, Martinton, Claytonville, Crescent City, Cullom, Earl Park, Cissna Park, Piper City, Flanagan, Morocco, Kempton, Odell, Dwight, Remington, Wellington, Campus, Thawville, Donovan, Forrest, Boswell, Wadena, Pontiac, Clifton, Gibson City, and Goodland.
This includes... US 41 Dragway.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
Strong to severe thunderstorms are also possible behind this wall of dust. Keep updated with this quickly evolving situation.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:45 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:45 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Ford, IL; Iroquois, IL; Livingston, IL; Benton, IN; Jasper, IN; Newton, IN

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:45 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:45 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Ford, IL; Iroquois, IL; Livingston, IL; Benton, IN; Jasper, IN; Newton, IN
